name: 林敏勝
objective: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
schedule:
Week 1　　Database and Database Users
Week 1　　Database System Concepts and Architecture
Week 2　　Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model
Week 3　　Enhanced Entity-Relationship and UML Modeling
Week 4　　The Relational Data Model and Relational Constraints
Week 5　　Relational Algebra and Relational Calculus
Week 6　　Relational Database Design by ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping
Week 7,8　　SQL-99: Schema Definition, Basic Constraints, and Queries
Week 9　　Midterm
Week 10　　More SQL: Assertions, Views, and Programming Techniques
Week 11　　Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases
Week 12　　Disk Storage, Basic File Structures, and Hashing
Week 13　　Index Structure for Files
Week 14　　Introduction to Transaction Processing Concepts and Theory
Week 15　　Concurrency Control Techniques
Week 16　　PHP & MySQL
Week 17　　Term Project
Week 18　　Final
materials:
Fundamentals of Database Systems,  5th Edition  by Elmasri & Navathe
, Addison Wesley
